[/et_pb_gallery][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Vidéo: Livre d’Or” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]


[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”TXT: Among all the reports…” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”|100px|||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Among all the reports we receive,
we try to select the most representative ones.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”TXT: Dr. LEFEBURE’s School…” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” background_color=”#e8a32c” custom_margin=”|100px|||false|false” custom_padding=”10px|10px|10px|10px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dr. LEFEBURE’s School guarantees the authenticity of all personal testimonies you are going to read. These are extracts coming from the very numerous letters and e-mails we have received since the creation of our website, and from the messages that are shared by our students in the forum dedicated to the complete training.

Then, of course, we select the ones we find most representative concerning the effects of the Phosphenism’s practice. But if you wish to consult them in full, we leave them at your disposal in our offices.

Nevertheless, with respect to the privacy of their authors, we never publish their full name.

Including the forum, we have already received
several thousands of testimonies.

It is by accumulating piles of testimonies that the physicist Chaldni proved to the skeptical scientific community that stones coming from space could fall on Earth. Similarly, the only way we will convince the scientific circles of the existence of phosphenic phenomena is by providing the largest possible quantity of testimonies and explanations.

As a research center, it is with great interest that we will read your testimonies. We would like to ask you to write down the detail of the exercises you practice, the duration of your daily session as well as a detailed description of your experiences.

You too can contribute with a testimony. Thanks for your collaboration.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”TXT: Phosphenism & Snow…” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Phosphenism & Snow Crystals:

Phosphenism develops ‟by priority” what an individual tends towards. It helps the best in everyone to bloom, through an harmonious originality expressed by CREATIVITY.

Individuals can be compared to the snow crystals, in that no two are alike, even though they are all formed of six points at 60° angles. There is therefore a relationship between the collective and the individual. The collective aspect is represented by the sixty-degree angle which is common to each snow crystal. Nevertheless, each crystal has its own shape and harmony that represent the individual aspect.

Phosphenism respects the collective structure while developing individual tendencies. The method is the same for everyone: mixing a thought with a phosphene, and yet the result is completely individual.

Dr. Francis LEFEBURE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”TXT: Purification of the…” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Purification of the Personality:

To understand the long-term effects of Phosphenic Mixing on the character, one must be aware that a phenomenon, similar to a whirlpool, starts to affect consciousness from the beginning. This phenomenon can be compared to a chemical reaction.

Let us imagine a complex but homogeneous liquid. A hot cylinder is plunged into that liquid producing a chemical reaction but does not spread to the whole of the liquid. Currents of attraction and repulsion surround the reaction and, thanks to the rotation of the earth, these currents take the shape of a whirlpool, like those we see when water flows out of a sink. A whirlpool drives away the heavier elements by centrifugal force, and in reaction, the lighter elements must go somewhere and concentrate in the center. Thus, air fills the gap created by a whirlpool in a torrent. When doctors use centrifugation on a urine sample, the bacteria are concentrated in the bottom of the tube and are topped by heavier molecules. But the clear water element has to go somewhere. It is pushed away by the other molecules and ends up at the top of the tube, near the center of rotation.

So, it is the same thing for the soul when a whirling movement is introduced. Indeed, when someone asks us the question ‟what if one uses Phosphenic Mixing for evil purposes?”, we always answer him or her ‟it will not last very long” because this whirling movement automatically produces a purification of the consciousness.

No matter how low, mundane, or even vindictive is the thought placed at the very beginning in a phosphene, a while later the person will move on to a more elevated thought of higher moral value as a theme for mixing, and so on infinitely.

Of course, one should start by giving the best of oneself. The summits of the human mind will be reached sooner.

Dr. Francis LEFEBURE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

You too, enter the largest training school of initiatic teachings:
The School of Doctor LEFEBURE. 
What you are going to discover there, will exceed by far your expectations.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.phosphenism.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/16-divers.jpg” title_text=”16-divers” align=”center” admin_label=”IMG: Logo” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”60%” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://www.phosphenism.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/mixage-phosphenique-eaux-calmes.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” z_index_tablet=”500″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” width=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ text_text_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”|10px||10px|false|false” z_index_tablet=”500″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Important Note

We have done our best to provide you with the most accurate translation of our French website. Nevertheless, some language errors may remain. So, don’t hesitate to contact us to point them out to us.

Thank you for your indulgence and for your consideration of the many hours spent translating all our pages and, more particularly, all the testimonies we share with you so that you may become aware of the impact that Phosphenism can have on those who practice it.

Wishing you the best with your practice of Phosphenism.

Daniel Stiennon (Director of the Dr. LEFEBURE’s School, France)

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
